rules.natural: Provided that a player completed the game, that player enjoyed the game.
In case the game wins an award, the game is successful.
Either the game won an award or the game sold well.
If the developer was promoted, then an investor is happy with the game.
Either a sequel is planned for the game, or if the game has a multiplayer feature, then the game is successful.
Provided that DLC is planned for the game, it is not the case that a sequel is planned.
Either the game has a single-player feature, or if the game has a multiplayer feature, then the game is successful.
If new content was added to the game, then DLC is planned for the game.
Either new content was added to the game or a balance patch was applied to the game.
In case the price of the game dropped, a discount offer was made for the game.
Assuming a discount offer was made for the game, the game does not have a crash bug.
Either a soundtrack was added to the game, or if the graphics of the game were updated, then the game has a graphics glitch.
Provided that microtransactions were added to the game, if the game is not successful, then a player enjoyed the game.
Whenever the game is review-bombed, players protested the game.
If the game had a free weekend, then the game was in early access.
Either the game had a free weekend or a demo of the game was released.
Assuming a demo of the game was released, if the game is not successful, then a player enjoyed the game.
Provided that the game was in early access, if the game is not successful, then a player enjoyed the game.
If the servers of the game were stable, then the game did not have server issues.
Whenever a roadmap was published for the game, an investor meeting occurred for the game.
If the developer fixed the crash bug in the game, then if it is not the case that if the game is not successful then the game does not have a crash bug, the game has a graphics glitch.
Provided that a tester found the crash bug in the game, if it is not the case that if the game is not successful then the game does not have a crash bug, the game has a graphics glitch.

Either the game was released on time, or if it is not the case that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game, then the release of the game was not delayed.
If it is not the case that if a player recommends the game then that player rated the game highly, then a player refunded the game.
Provided that it is not the case that if the game sold well then the game is successful, the developer was promoted.
If it is not the case that if the game sold well then the game is successful, a roadmap was published for the game.
In case it is not true that if the game sold well then the game is successful, an investor is not happy with the game.
Provided that it is not the case that if the game sold well then the game is successful, an investor meeting did not occur for the game.
If it is not the case that if a balance patch was applied to the game then DLC is planned for the game, the community is angry about the game.
Assuming it is not true that if a balance patch was applied to the game then DLC is planned for the game, the community is not angry about the game.
Provided that it is not true that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game, the release of the game was delayed.
In case it is not the case that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game, the game did not undergo internal testing.

If it is not the case that if it is not true that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game then the game underwent internal testing, the game had a public beta.
Provided that it is not the case that if it is not true that if the game is not successful then a player completed the game then a player rated the game highly, the game had server issues.
Assuming it is not the case that if the game is not successful then a player completed the game, a player recommended the game.
In case it is not true that if the game is not successful then the game does not have a crash bug, the graphics of the game were updated.
Whenever microtransactions were not added to the game, the game was review-bombed.
Assuming microtransactions were not added to the game, players did not protest the game.
Provided that the game is not successful, the price of the game dropped.
In case the game is not successful, the game has a crash bug.
Provided that the game is not successful, a player did not enjoy the game.
